title: Monogram Stainless Steel Fully Integrated Built-In Dishwasher - ZDT975SSJSS
description:
Features:

Most advanced wash system with more than 140 cleaning jets 
Achieve the ultimate clean from an industry-leading number of jets that deliver complete washing coverage to every corner of the dishwasher
Full extension smooth glide upper rack with fold-down tines 
Easily fit large or odd-shaped items in the upper rack
Deep Clean Silverware Jets 
Powerful jets blast away stuck-on food for silverware that's always spotless
Bottle Jets 
Hard-to-reach areas inside tall items get completely clean with four dedicated jets integrated into the upper rack that shower water deep inside for the ultimate clean
LED lighting 
Illuminates the entire interior, leaving no question as to whether or not dishes have been cleaned
39 dBA with LED status indicator on door
A dishwasher this quiet has a status indicator to tell you if the dishwasher is Washing, Drying or Clean
Cabinet depth installation 
Customize this appearance with a panel to match the décor of your kitchen
WiFi Connect 
Monitor performance and check cycle status using your mobile device
Easy touch adjustable upper rack with 2 Stem Safe wine glass holders
Quickly adjust the upper rack 2 inches up or down to accommodate tall glassware and 10 ½" plates with plenty of room in the bottom rack for large platters and cookie sheets
Wash zones 
Wash a true half-load in either the upper or lower rack without sacrificing options and cycles available on a full wash
Exclusive Max Dry system 
Improves drying performance by utilizing a high output, multi-speed fan
Top control LCD display
User-friendly controls combined with a LCD screen complement the sleek stainless look
3-piece silverware basket with Soft-Touch handle 
Table-ready silverware is assured with a three-piece basket that can divide and separate for convenient placement
Lower rack adjustable tines and Wash Your Way customizable rack 
Configure racks to fit your dishes with adjustable loading options and multi-position, fold-down tines
Reversing blade wash arm 
Dishes come out impressively clean thanks to this revolutionary lower wash arm, with 25 spray jets reversing direction to hit items from every angle
